text.1: The leader creates a game for the players by choosing the number of players
text.2: After creating the game, the leader shows each player his QR code, the player must scan it to get his number in the game.
text.3: Players do not need to know who has which number, all players know only their number, obtained by scanning the QR-code, the leader also does not know the numbers of players.
text.4: After clicking on the 'Start' button, you will see numbers, these are pairs that perform tasks from the leader
text.5: The leader puts the task or question to his or her discretion when a player hears his or her number, shows it to other players, and waits for the leader to announce the other player's number.
